### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed

### Testing
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I have tested in multiple browsers
- [ ] I have tested responsive design (mobile/tablet/desktop)
- [ ] Production build works correctly

### Dependencies & Security
- [ ] I have checked for dependency vulnerabilities (`npm audit`)
- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] I have not committed any secrets or API keys
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities

### Git Best Practices
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the main branch
- [ ] I have used meaningful commit messages
- [ ] I have followed [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) guidelines
- [ ] My commits are focused and atomic
